notes.player: These were heavily constructed servo-claws and matched augmetic implants designed to amplify and take advantage of an Ogryn's already formidable strength and physical stature. Charonite Claws needed to be surgically implanted, which meant that an Ogryn needed to have both his hands and forearms amputated in order to use them. Charonite Claws emerged in the early days of the Great Crusade as powerful weapons intended for use in the murderous confines of shipboard combat. For Post-Great Crusade Games, they are worth 30,000 Solars and are Exotic.
